title: About GTMVP - Transforming Businesses Since 2020
content:
About GTMVP

We're the bridge between growing businesses and the technology solutions they need to scale. From complete automation for home services to elite developers for SaaS companies.

Key Metrics:
- 350+ Businesses Transformed
- $50M+ Revenue Generated
- 98% Client Satisfaction
- 24/7 Support Available

Our Mission:
We believe every growing business deserves access to world-class technology and talent, regardless of their size or budget. That's why we've created two specialized solutions that deliver enterprise-level results at a fraction of the cost.

Whether you're a home services business losing leads to slow response times, or a SaaS founder struggling to find quality developers, we have the proven solutions to accelerate your growth.

Our Story:
GTMVP was born from a simple observation: growing businesses were being held back by two critical gaps - home services companies losing customers to slow response times, and SaaS founders struggling to find quality developers who understood their vision.

After helping dozens of businesses individually, we realized these weren't isolated problems. They were systematic challenges that required systematic solutions. So we built them.

Today, we're not just a service provider - we're growth partners who understand that behind every business metric is a founder's dream, a family's livelihood, and a vision for something better.

Steve Kaplan - Founder & Digital Strategist

"After over a decade of transforming businesses through innovative digital strategies and AI-driven marketing, I saw a clear opportunity to help growing companies access the same powerful tools and talent that were previously only available to enterprise businesses."

"I thrive at the intersection of AI and marketing, leveraging cutting-edge technologies to optimize performance, streamline processes, and create impactful solutions that deliver meaningful business results."

Steve Kaplan's Achievements:
- 10+ Years Experience
- $2M Monthly Ad Spend Managed
- 30x ROAS Achieved
- Managed $2M monthly ad spend with up to 30x ROAS
- Delivered $5.5M in direct sales over five years
- Built and scaled global teams with consistent YOY growth
- Expert in Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and LinkedIn Ads

Founder's Mission:
"My mission is to bridge the gap between cutting-edge technology and growing businesses, creating solutions that deliver measurable results through the perfect blend of AI innovation and strategic marketing expertise."

Core Values:
- Data-Driven Growth: Leverage analytics and insights to drive strategic decision-making
- AI-Powered Solutions: Harness cutting-edge AI to optimize performance and results
- Scalable Success: Build systems that grow with your business and drive consistent results

Our Vision:
"To democratize access to world-class technology and talent, making enterprise-level solutions available to every growing business, regardless of size or budget."

What Makes GTMVP Different:
- Innovation First: We don't just follow trends - we create solutions that set new standards in our industry
- Partnership Mindset: Your success is our success. We're not vendors - we're growth partners invested in your journey
- Results Obsessed: Every strategy, every line of code, every automation is designed with one goal: measurable growth

Behind the Scenes:
- Obsessive Quality Control: Every automation is tested 50+ times. Every developer goes through 6 rounds of vetting. We don't ship until it's perfect
- 24/7 Monitoring: Our systems never sleep. Real-time monitoring, instant alerts, and proactive maintenance ensure your business never misses a beat
- Continuous Innovation: We invest 20% of our time in R&D, constantly improving our solutions and staying ahead of industry trends

Our Commitment:
- Response within 2 hours, guaranteed
- Dedicated success manager for every client
- Performance guarantees on all services
- Transparent reporting and analytics
- Risk-free trial periods
